view.beerapp.repository

Class FirebaseDrinkRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.beerapp.repository.FirebaseDrinkRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabaseData, IDrinkRepository

    public class FirebaseDrinkRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrinkRepository, IDatabaseData
    Use to do CRUD operation on the drink node in Firebase. Singleton Pattern
